snippet: In its earning report, Infosys, an Indian outsourcing company, said the Department of Homeland Security had “found errors in a significant percentage” of its hiring records.
abstract: Infosys, Indian outsourcing company based in Bangalore, says in an earnings report that it has set aside $35 million for a possible settlement in a visa fraud inquiry in Texas.
lead_paragraph: In its earning report, Infosys, an Indian outsourcing company, said the Department of Homeland Security had “found errors in a significant percentage” of its hiring records.

headline.main: Texas: Company Sets Aside Payment for Visa Fraud
headline.print_headline: Texas: Company Sets Aside Payment For Visa Fraud
